transcript.text: hi it's Katie G with citizens
investigative report and I just wanted
to let you know that I will be a guest
caller tonight on the BP earth watch
live blog talk radio show with Steve
motley and Jesse the show is from 6 to 9
p.m. Central Time I just call in as a
guest caller so Steve and Jesse have
both been an inspiration for me to start
my youtube channel I love them both so
much and so if you're not following
these great youtubers please do so Steve
motley and BP Earth watch please take a
minute to go over to subscribe to their
channels you can get to their show
tonight by simply going to WWE
BlogTalkRadio calm
watch live and it'll come up for you
here in just a second
I'll also put the lot link in the
description I was a calling guest last
night to their show and I uploaded an
audio version of that to my patreon so
if you're already supporting me there
you can go there now listen to last
night's show it was really great it was
a very good show and if you enjoy my
work and would like to become a patreon
and support me for as little as $1 a
month or $5 a month just go to the
patreon.com slash citizen's
investigative report and you will get
once you make your pledge you'll get
immediate access to the additional
content created especially for that
there's some other radio shows on there
as well thanks for supporting my channel
and please tune in to the blog talk
radio show tonight from 6 to 9 p.m.
Central Time
